Hundreds protesting against Trump in Scotland according to BBC MisReporting Scotland. Hundreds.

@LenziePar @IanDunt @Stuarty2112 You spelt cunts wrong.
BBC Scotland actually showing the huge numbers outside concert hall this time, during indyref it was 8 folk standing on Rutherglen Main St!
@AcciesFans To be fair, sounds like they did well going from 1-0 to 3-0 with ten men. Nine a step too far.
@Wais_together @G32woman Still not getting it...take away Scotland's vote and the outcome would have been the same in all but 3 or 4.
@panesthesia Where would UK economy have been without 40 years of oil?. What a bunch of ungrateful sods you are. Not a word of thanks.
@Wais_together @G32woman You're missing the point. Elections where our vote has INFLUENCED the result. Think about it.
@Wais_together @G32woman There has been 19 general elections since WW2.
@Wais_together @G32woman You're incredible.
@Wais_together @G32woman David Cameron, born London, was a Scot?
@Wais_together @G32woman Yes, I think it's 3 times since WW2 that Scots votes mattered in outcome, out of how many GEs?
@Wais_together @G32woman 330-232, what about my point? And EVEL pretty much rules out a Scot being PM ever again.
@Wais_together @G32woman 330 Tory, 232 Labour. If every adult in Scotland voted Labour we'd still have a Tory govt. Our votes rarely matter

Aberdeen hotelier, I'm sorry your business is suffering, but don't lie & say "the oil is gone". Experts believe we have a.l 40 years left.
